title: Home - Be The Smart One (BTS1)
description: BTS1 (Be The Smart One) adalah tempat les calistung terpercaya untuk anak usia 3â€“7 tahun. Dengan metode menyenangkan dan guru berpengalaman, kami bantu anak belajar membaca, menulis, dan berhitung sejak dini.

testimonials.name: Jeny
testimonials.quote: My child, Athan, really enjoys the Calistung lessons at BTS. He gets to learn while playing with his friends, and the teachers are very patient in guiding the children.

testimonials.name: Racha
testimonials.quote: My daughter has shown a bit of confidence and ability while studying at BTS One. The teachers at BTS One are very patient in teaching overactive children ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€

testimonials.name: Indah
testimonials.quote: I was initially hesitant to enroll Arjuna at such a young age, but the teachers at BTS One have been incredibly patient. Now heâ€™s able to follow lessons well and has shown great improvement.
